articles.title: South Africa Flooding: Live Updates - The New York Times
articles.description: Nearly 4,000 homes have been destroyed and more than twice as many damaged in the Durban area after a week of punishing rains and mudslides. The death toll is now 443, with about four dozen people unaccounted for.
